author: makortel
body:
Backport of #9449:

```
Migrate TrackerLayerIdAccessor to TrackerTopology by moving its functionality
to TrackerTopology.
```

Tested in CMSSW_6_2_SLHCDEV_X_2015-05-28-1100 that the FourMu workflows run, relying on #9449 on that there are no changes in results.

@rovere @VinInn @venturia @boudoul
title: Merge TrackerLayerIdAccessor to TrackerTopology (6_2_SLHCDEV_X)
